content.rendered:
Certified Medical Coder (CPC) | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time, Monday-Friday 8:00am-5:00pm
  • 3+ years experience as a coder/biller
  • Experience with patient encounters
  • Experience with auditing charts and generating reports required
  • Must have experience with Medicare, Medicaid, Tricare and Commercial payers
  • Will be responsible for billing and A/R follow of claims
  • CPC required
  • $16-$20/hour
